opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinion:
510 U.S. 1106

Oklahoma et al.
v.
New Mexico.

No. 109, Orig.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 22, 1994.

1

Motion of the Special Master for compensation and reimbursement of expenses and to be discharged as Special Master granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $740.71 for the period October 1 through December 15, 1993, to be paid one-third by each party. The Special Master is hereby discharged with the thanks of the Court. [For earlier decision herein, see, e. g., ante, p. 126.]
